title: Vase, ca. 1895
medium: Mold-blown, etched and carved glass, enamel fusions
markings: On underside; incised in glass "Daum Nancy."
provenance: 2013, Given to Cooper-Hewitt by owner Harry C. Sigman
description: Dark green and orange on an opaque ground, decorated with a high relief forest scene of thick trees with a spire and town roofs in the distance, beneath a bright orange sky; the vase widens as it rises until reaching a narrow neck just below the mouth.

tombstone.epitaph: Vase, ca. 1895.Mold-blown, etched and carved glass, enamel fusions. Gift of Harry C. Sigman. 2013-21-2.
